skill_description: Deals 35 damage to 3x3 area, 2 turn cooldown
Next attack deals 90 damage, 3 turn cooldown
Hits 2 enemies in line for 60 each
Freezes enemies for 1 turn, 3 tile range
Reduces enemy damage by 10 for 2 turns
Heals 30 to all allies for 3 turns
Forces enemy to attack ally once
Puts target to sleep for 2 turns
+1 move speed to allies for 2 turns
